title: FlexJobs Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape jobs from FlexJobs using keywords and location. Supports advanced features like cookie injection and pagination control.

keyword.title: Keyword(s)
keyword.description: The job title, skill, or keyword to search for (e.g., 'software developer').

location.title: Location
location.description: Optional location filter to narrow down the job search.

posted_date.title: Date Posted
posted_date.description: Filter jobs by the date they were posted.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, the scraper will visit each job's detail page to extract the full description. If disabled, it only collects data from the list page (faster).

maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. The scraper will stop when this limit is reached.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit. The scraper stops if it hits this limit, even if 'Maximum Jobs' has not been reached.

cookies.title: Custom Cookies (Raw Header)
cookies.description: Optional raw Cookie header string to send with requests. Useful for bypassing consent modals or authentication.

cookiesJson.title: Custom Cookies (JSON)
cookiesJson.description: Optional JSON for cookies. Accepts an array of strings or a name-value map. Merged with the raw header.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (recommended). Consider Residential proxies if you encounter blocking.
